thread.title: BRIEF-United to sell tickets for San Francisco-Xian flights Saturday
thread.title_full: BRIEF-United to sell tickets for San Francisco-Xian flights Saturday | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-United to sell tickets for San Francisco-Xian flights Saturday
text: Oct 8 * United Continental Holdings Inc on Saturday will begin selling tickets for airline industry's first nonstop flights between San Francisco and Xian, China - Brian Znotins, United's vice president of network Further company coverage: (Reporting By Jeffrey Dastin)
